effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the holder's Coolness during a Super Contest's Visual Competition.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the holder's Coolness while in a contest.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせて　コンテストに　参加すると
その　ポケモンは　いつもより
かっこよく　みられる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
During a Contest, it raises the Cool
aspect of the Pokémon holding it.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Aumenta la “Classe” di chi l’indossa in una Gara.

Potencia un movimiento que se use de forma
consecutiva. Pero el efecto se pierde si se
emplea otro movimiento.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Trainer erhöhen damit in
Wettbewerben die „Coolness“ ihres Pokémon.

Objet à tenir. Augmente le Sang-froid
d’un Pokémon dans les Concours.

지니게 하여 콘테스트에 참가하면
그 포켓몬은 여느 때보다
근사하게 보인다.

もたせて　コンテストに　さんかすると
その　ポケモンは　いつもより
かっこよく　みられる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Cool aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the Cool aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

Objet à tenir. Augmente le Sang-froid
d’un Pokémon dans les Concours.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Cool” aspect of the
holder in a Contest in Sinnoh.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Cool” aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts the “Cool” aspect of the
holder in a Contest.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON’s
COOL condition in CONTESTS.

A hold item that
raises COOL in
CONTESTS.

A hold item that
raises COOL in
